alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 9:35PM EDT until September 07 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wakulla County in Big Bend Florida... Southwestern Gadsden County in Big Bend Florida... Central Liberty County in Big Bend Florida... Southwestern Leon County in Big Bend Florida... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 935 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Greensboro, or 14 miles east of Blountstown, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hosford, Lowry, Telogia, Juniper, Vilas, and Clio. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
